Specific Details: Phone call with Deputy Martin Kenny TD.
Subject Matter: Phone call with Deputy Martin Kenny TD.
Intended Results: To inform Deputy Martin Kenny TD of some of the key issues arising in prisons from IPRT perspective.
Lobbying Activities: IPRT's Acting Executive Director spoke to Deputy Martin Kenny on 1 February 2023 as per his request for a call, to outline some of the key issues arising in prisons at the moment. Identified key issues for IPRT as including: rising prison numbers, overcrowding and the impact on rehabilitative services; difficulties with staffing levels and need for workforce planning; and importance of ensuring consistency across the estate in terms of the pre- and post-release supports provided to individuals.|Submission|1
